VPS directly addresses the symptomatic communicating hydrocephalus without interrupting the effective antitumor regimen, whereas discontinuing ONC201 or adding corticosteroids would compromise the proven therapeutic benefit or fail to resolve the hydrocephalus definitively. Observation alone is unsafe given progressive symptoms despite anti-emetics.
